程序包 org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable

Provides typed mutable wrappers to primitive values and Object.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Mutable<T>
    Provides mutable access to a value.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    MutableBoolean
    A mutable boolean wrapper.
    MutableByte
    A mutable byte wrapper.
    MutableDouble
    A mutable double wrapper.
    MutableFloat
    A mutable float wrapper.

    MutableObject<T>
    A mutable Object wrapper.

    A mutable short wrapper.

程序包org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable的说明

Provides typed mutable wrappers to primitive values and Object. These wrappers are similar to the wrappers provided by the Java API, but allow the wrapped value to be changed without needing to create a separate wrapper object. These classes are not thread-safe.

从以下版本开始:
2.1
